title: server lag?
body: im just wondering if anyone else is experiencing the lag. my friends and i play games like hexakill etc... but it will sometimes lag everyone out of the game. i am currently lagged out of a game and it has been over an hour and it still says im in game. i cant do anything about it. anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: Not I. Have you checked the [server status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce)?
